00042 void
00043 ULexer::AddKeyword( const tstring& pattern, int tokenId )
00044 {
00046         B_ASSERT( tokenId >= 0 && tokenId < 0x70000000 );
00047 
00050         _keywordVec.push_back( pattern );
00051         _keywordTokenIdVec.push_back( tokenId );

00055 bool
00056 ULexer::Lex( const char *text, unsigned char eos )
00057 {
00059         _tokenStream.clear();
00060         _errors.clear();
00061 
00062         unsigned int lineNum = 1;
00063 
00065         unsigned char ch = text[ 0 ];
00066         if ( ch == eos )
00067         {
00069                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_EOS, "", 0 ) );
00070                 return true;
00071         }
00072 
00074         unsigned char la = text[ 1 ];
00075 
00077         unsigned long offset = 1;
00078         while ( ch != eos )
00079         {
00081                 switch( ch )
00082                 {
00084                 case '\n':
00085                         ++lineNum;
00086                 case ' ':
00087                 case '\r':
00088                 case '\t':
00089                         break;
00090 
00092                 case '=':
00094                         if ( la == '=' )
00095                         {       
00096                                 la = text[ ++offset ];  
00097                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_ISEQUAL, "==", lineNum ) );
00098                         }
00099                         else 
00100                         {       
00101                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_EQUAL, "=", lineNum ) );
00102                         }
00103                         break;
00104 
00105                 case '+':
00106                         switch( la )
00107                         {
00108                         case '+':
00109                                 {       
00110                                         la = text[ ++offset ];  
00111                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_PLUSPLUS, "++", lineNum ) );
00112                                 }
00113                                 break;
00114 
00115                         case '=':
00116                                 {       
00117                                         la = text[ ++offset ];  
00118                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_PLUSEQUAL, "+=", lineNum ) );
00119                                 }
00120                                 break;
00121 
00122                         default:
00123                                 {       
00124                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_PLUS, "+", lineNum ) );
00125                                 }
00126                                 break;
00127                         };
00128                         break;
00129 
00130                 case '-':
00131                         switch( la )
00132                         {
00133                         case '-':
00134                                 {       
00135                                         la = text[ ++offset ];  
00136                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_MINUSMINUS, "--", lineNum ) );
00137                                 }
00138                                 break;
00139 
00140                         case '=':
00141                                 {       
00142                                         la = text[ ++offset ];  
00143                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_MINUSEQUAL, "-=", lineNum ) );
00144                                 }
00145                                 break;
00146 
00147                         case '>':
00148                                 {       
00149                                         la = text[ ++offset ];  
00150                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_INDIRECTION, "->", lineNum ) );
00151                                 }
00152                                 break;
00153 
00154                         default:
00155                                 {       
00156                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_MINUS, "-", lineNum ) );
00157                                 }
00158                                 break;
00159                         };
00160                         break;
00161 
00162                 case '*':
00163                         if ( la == '=' )
00164                         {       
00165                                 la = text[ ++offset ];  
00166                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_MULTIPLYEQUAL, "*=", lineNum ) );
00167                         }
00168                         else
00169                         {
00170                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_ASTERISK, "*", lineNum ) );
00171                         }
00172                         break;
00173 
00174                 case '/':
00175                         switch( la )
00176                         {       
00177                         case '=':
00178                                 {       
00179                                         la = text[ ++offset ];  
00180                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_DIVIDEEQUAL, "/=", lineNum ) );
00181                                 }
00182                                 break;
00183 
00184                         case '/':
00185                                 {       
00186 
00187                                         do
00188                                         {
00189                                                 ch = la;
00190 
00192                                                 if ( ch == eos )
00193                                                         return( _errors.size() == 0 );
00194 
00195                                                 la = text[ ++offset ];
00196                                         }
00197                                         while ( ch != '\n' );
00198                                         ++lineNum;
00199                                 }
00200                                 break;
00201 
00202                         case '*':
00203                                 {       
00204 
00205                                         ch = la;
00206                                         la = text[ ++offset ];
00207                                         do
00208                                         {
00209                                                 ch = la;
00210                                                 if ( ch == eos )
00211                                                 {
00214                                                         _errors.push_back( "Lexer error: end of stream found before end of block comment!\n" );
00215                                                         return false;
00216                                                 }
00217                                                 if ( ch == '\n' )
00218                                                         ++lineNum;
00219 
00220                                                 la = text[ ++offset ];
00221                                         }
00222                                         while ( !( ch == '*' && la == '/' ) );
00223 
00225                                         la = text[ ++offset ];
00226                                 }
00227                                 break;
00228 
00229                         default:
00230                                 {       
00231                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_SLASH, "/", lineNum ) );
00232                                 }
00233                                 break;
00234                         };
00235                         break;
00236 
00237                 case '%':
00238                         if ( la == '=' )
00239                         {       
00240                                 la = text[ ++offset ];  
00241                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_PERCENTEQUAL, "%=", lineNum ) );
00242                         }
00243                         else
00244                         {       
00245                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_PERCENT, "%", lineNum ) );
00246                         }
00247                         break;
00248 
00249                 case '!':
00250                         if ( la == '=' )
00251                         {       
00252                                 la = text[ ++offset ];  
00253                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_NOTEQUAL, "!=", lineNum ) );
00254                         }
00255                         else
00256                         {       
00257                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_EXCLAMATION, "!", lineNum ) );
00258                         }
00259                         break;
00260 
00261                 case '[':
00262                         {
00263                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_LSQUAREBRACE, "[ ", lineNum ) );
00264                         }
00265                         break;
00266 
00267                 case ']':
00268                         {
00269                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_RSQUAREBRACE, " ]", lineNum ) );
00270                         }
00271                         break;
00272 
00273                 case '(':
00274                         {
00275                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_LPAREN, "(", lineNum ) );
00276                         }
00277                         break;
00278 
00279                 case ')':
00280                         {
00281                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_RPAREN, ")", lineNum ) );
00282                         }
00283                         break;
00284 
00285                 case '{':
00286                         {
00287                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_LBRACE, "{", lineNum ) );
00288                         }
00289                         break;
00290 
00291                 case '}':
00292                         {
00293                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_RBRACE, "}", lineNum ) );
00294                         }
00295                         break;
00296 
00297                 case '&':
00298                         {
00299                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_AND, "&", lineNum ) );
00300                         }
00301                         break;
00302 
00303                 case '|':
00304                         {
00305                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_OR, "|", lineNum ) );
00306                         }
00307                         break;
00308 
00309                 case '<':
00310                         switch( la )
00311                         {
00312                         case '=':
00313                                 {       
00314                                         la = text[ ++offset ];  
00315                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_LESSEQUAL, "<=", lineNum ) );
00316                                 }
00317                                 break;
00318 
00319                         case '<':
00320                                 {       
00321                                         la = text[ ++offset ];  
00322                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_LSHIFT, "<<", lineNum ) );
00323                                 }
00324                                 break;
00325 
00326                         default:
00327                                 {       
00328                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_LESS, "<", lineNum ) );
00329                                 }
00330                                 break;
00331                         };
00332                         break;
00333 
00334                 case '>':
00335                         switch( la )
00336                         {
00337                         case '=':
00338                                 {       
00339                                         la = text[ ++offset ];  
00340                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_GREATEREQUAL, ">=", lineNum ) );
00341                                 }
00342                                 break;
00343 
00344                         case '>':
00345                                 {       
00346                                         la = text[ ++offset ];  
00347                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_RSHIFT, ">>", lineNum ) );
00348                                 }
00349                                 break;
00350 
00351                         default:
00352                                 {       
00353                                         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_GREATER, ">", lineNum ) );
00354                                 }
00355                                 break;
00356                         };
00357                         break;
00358 
00359                 case ',':
00360                         {
00361                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_COMMA, ",", lineNum ) );
00362                         }
00363                         break;
00364 
00365                 case '.':
00366                         {
00367                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_PERIOD, ".", lineNum ) );
00368                         }
00369                         break;
00370 
00371                 case ';':
00372                         {
00373                                 _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_SEMICOLON, ";", lineNum ) );
00374                         }
00375                         break;
00376 
00377                 case '\'':
00378                 case '"':
00381                         {
00383                                 char endChar = ch;
00384                                 SToken newToken( ch == '\'' ? UL_CHAR : UL_STRING, "", lineNum );
00385                                 if ( la != endChar )
00386                                 {
00387                                         do
00388                                         {
00390                                                 ch = la;
00391                                                 la = text[ ++offset ];
00392 
00395                                                 if ( ch == '\\' )
00396                                                 {
00399                                                         if ( la == eos )
00400                                                         {
00401                                                                 _errors.push_back( "Lexer error: end of stream encounted during escape sequence!\n" );
00402                                                                 return false;
00403                                                         }
00404 
00406                                                         switch( la )
00407                                                         {
00408                                                         case 'n':
00409                                                                 newToken.text.append( 1, '\n' );
00410                                                                 break;
00411                                                         case 't':
00412                                                                 newToken.text.append( 1, '\t' );
00413                                                                 break;
00414                                                         case '\\':
00415                                                                 newToken.text.append( 1, '\\' );
00416                                                                 break;
00417                                                         case '\'':
00418                                                                 newToken.text.append( 1, '\'' );
00419                                                                 break;
00420                                                         case '"':
00421                                                                 newToken.text.append( 1, '\"' );
00422                                                                 break;
00423                                                         default:
00424                                                                 tstring error;
00425                                                                 SPrintF( error, "Lexer error, line %d: unknown escape sequence encountered!\n", lineNum );
00426                                                                 _errors.push_back( error );
00427                                                                 break;
00428                                                         };
00429 
00431                                                         la = text[ ++offset ];
00432                                                 }
00433                                                 else
00434                                                 {
00437                                                         if ( ch == eos )
00438                                                         {
00441                                                                 _errors.push_back( "Lexer error: end of stream found before end of string or character sequence!\n" );
00442                                                                 return false;
00443                                                         }
00444 
00448                                                         if ( ch == '\n' || ch == '\r' )
00449                                                         {
00451                                                                 ++lineNum;
00452                                                                 if ( la == '\r' )
00453                                                                 {
00455                                                                         la = text[ ++offset ];
00456                                                                 }
00457 
00458                                                                 tstring error;
00459                                                                 SPrintF( error, "Lexer error, line %d: newline found in string or character sequence!\n", lineNum );
00460                                                                 _errors.push_back( error );
00461                                                                 continue;
00462                                                         }
00463 
00465                                                         newToken.text.append( 1, ch );
00466                                                 }
00467                                         }
00468                                         while ( la != endChar );
00469                                 }
00470 
00472                                 la = text[ ++offset ];
00473 
00475                                 _tokenStream.push_back( newToken );
00476                         }
00477                         break;
00478 
00479                 default:
00480                         {
00483                                 if ( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
00484                                 {
00485                                         SToken newToken( UL_NUMBER, "", lineNum );
00486                                         newToken.text.append( 1, ch );
00487 
00489                                         while ( la >= '0' && la <= '9' )
00490                                         {
00492                                                 ch = la;
00493 
00495                                                 newToken.text.append( 1, ch );
00496 
00498                                                 la = text[ ++offset ];
00499                                         }
00500 
00502                                         _tokenStream.push_back( newToken );
00503                                 }
00504                                 else if ( isalpha( ch ) || ch == '_' )
00505                                 {
00509                                         SToken newToken( UL_IDENTIFIER, "", lineNum );
00510                                         newToken.text.append( 1, ch );
00511 
00514                                         while ( isalnum( la ) || la == '_' )
00515                                         {
00517                                                 ch = la;
00518 
00520                                                 newToken.text.append( 1, ch );
00521 
00523                                                 la = text[ ++offset ];
00524                                         }
00525 
00527                                         _tokenStream.push_back( newToken );
00528                                 }
00529                                 else
00530                                 {
00532                                         tstring error;
00533                                         SPrintF( error, "Lexer error, line %d: invalid character!\n", lineNum );
00534                                         _errors.push_back( error );
00535                                 }
00536 
00538 
00540                         }
00541                 };
00542 
00544                 ch = la;
00545 
00547                 if ( la != eos )
00548                 {
00549                         la = text[ ++offset ];
00550                 }
00551         }
00552 
00554         _tokenStream.push_back( SToken( UL_EOS, "", lineNum ) );
00555 
00557         return( _errors.size() == 0 );
00558 }
